queries.title: Search Queries
queries.description: List of search queries to run against Google Jobs API

maxPagesPerQuery.title: Max Pages Per Query
maxPagesPerQuery.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch for each query (10 jobs per page)

saveToDataset.title: Save to Dataset
saveToDataset.description: Whether to save results to Apify dataset

pushToDatabase.title: Push to Database
pushToDatabase.description: Whether to push results to a database (currently disabled)

databaseUrl.title: Database URL
databaseUrl.description: URL of the database to push results to (currently not used)

databaseTable.title: Database Table
databaseTable.description: Name of the database table to push results to (currently not used)

deduplicateJobs.title: Deduplicate Jobs
deduplicateJobs.description: Whether to deduplicate jobs when pushing to database (currently not used)

fullTimeOnly.title: Full-Time Only
fullTimeOnly.description: Whether to include only full-time positions

excludeFastFood.title: Exclude Fast Food
excludeFastFood.description: Whether to exclude fast food restaurants

includeHunterData.title: Include Hunter.io Data
includeHunterData.description: Whether to include email addresses from Hunter.io (requires HUNTER_API_KEY in .env)
